channel.title: Ngc2467 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Ngc2467 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Skull and Crossbones Nebula
item.description: NGC 2467, also known as the “Skull and Crossbones Nebula,” is a region where new stars are being born. Some people think it looks like a grinning skull, while others see the face of a colorful mandrill.
